content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the case involved two parties the defendant and the applicant the defendant was ordered to pay €54 for stamp duty and €6413 for court fees while the applicant was required to pay €400 for stamp duty and €6413 for court fees the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property awarding the applicant ownership of certain items and ordering the defendant to take ownership of the remaining items the text discusses three articles from the civil code related to property the court also addressed allegations of violence and infidelity made by both parties the court approved the amended application made by the applicant to dissolve the marriage and awarded various household items to the applicant the court ordered the applicant to pay a stamp duty of €400 and the costs of sending procedural documents to the state while the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty of €54 and the same costs for sending procedural documents to the state

metadata.cost: 54 EUR (stamp duty) + 64.13 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant + 400 EUR (stamp duty) + 64.13 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
